sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Educational Institution Presiding Officer Act.

sections.heading: The board of trustees,
sections.text:
directors or managers, or the senate, of any college, seminary, academy
or other educational institution, incorporated under any general or
special law of this state, solely for educational purposes, and
possessing no capital stock, may elect its own presiding officer for
such term as such board or senate may determine, the provisions of any
special charter to the contrary notwithstanding.
